view.label

Class LabelView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.label.LabelView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LabelView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for keeping track of labels of the diagram and everything label-positional orientated
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      LabelView()
      make a new empty labelrepo
      LabelView(java.util.Map<Label,java.awt.geom.Point2D> labelPoint2DMap)
